mapper.sql: id, name, url, createDate, creator, lastModifier, lastModDate, status
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tbl_navigation ( name, url, createDate, creator, lastModifier, lastModDate, status ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{url}, #{createDate}, #{creator}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{status} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE tbl_navigation
name = #{name},
url = #{url},
createDate = #{createDate},
creator = #{creator},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
status = #{status},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE tbl_navigation
name = #{map.name},
url = #{map.url},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
creator = #{map.creator},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
status = #{map.status},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_navigation ( name, url, createDate, creator, lastModifier, lastModDate, status ) VALUES ( #{map.name}, #{map.url}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.creator}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.status} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tbl_navigation
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND name like CONCAT('%', #{name} , '%')
AND url like CONCAT('%', #{url} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
